11 RosOpenIgtlBridge::RosOpenIgtlBridge(ros::NodeHandle nh): nh_(nh)
12 {
13  flangeTargetSub = nh_.subscribe("/flangeTarget",1,&RosOpenIgtlBridge::transformCallback,this);
14 
15  flangePub = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/flangeLBR",1);
16 
17  for(int i=0; i < 7; i++)
18  {
19  std::stringstream sstream;
20  sstream << "/LBR/des/joint" << i+1;
21  lbrJointAngleSub[i] = nh_.subscribe<std_msgs::Float64>(sstream.str().c_str(),1,boost::bind(&RosOpenIgtlBridge::lbrJointAngleCallback,this,_1,i));
22  sstream.str(std::string());
23 
24  sstream << "/LBR/act/joint" << i+1;
25  lbrJointAnglePub[i] = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>(sstream.str().c_str(),1);
26  sstream.str(std::string());
27  }
28 
29  stateServiceServer = nh_.advertiseService("/openIGTLState",&RosOpenIgtlBridge::stateService,this);
30  boost::thread(boost::bind(&RosOpenIgtlBridge::openIGTLinkTransformThread,this));
31  openIGTLinkThread();
32 }

34 void RosOpenIgtlBridge::transformCallback(geometry_msgs::PoseStampedConstPtr transform)
35 {
36  poseFL_new = transform->pose;
37  rosTransformReceived_ = true;
38 }

40 //second thread to get transform messages from the OpenIGTL-Interface
41 void RosOpenIgtlBridge::openIGTLinkTransformThread()
42 {
43  ROS_INFO("Entering Transformation Thread");
44  transformSocket_ = igtl::ClientSocket::New();
45  transformSocket_->DebugOff();
46 
47  double startTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
48  double endTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
49  do
50  {
51  rTransform = transformSocket_->ConnectToServer(TRANSFORM_IP,TRANSFORM_PORT);
52  endTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
53  ROS_WARN_NAMED("ROSOpenIGTL","Trying to connect to OpenIGTL-Server");
54  }
55  while(rTransform==-1 && ros::ok() && endTime - startTime <= CONNECTION_TIMEOUT);
56  if(rTransform==-1)
57  {
58  ROS_ERROR("No OpenIGTLink-Server available");
59  ros::shutdown();
60  }
61 
62  while(rTransform!=-1 && ros::ok())
63  {
64  igtl::MessageHeader::Pointer messageHeaderTransform;
65  messageHeaderTransform = igtl::MessageHeader::New();
66  this->receiveTransform(transformSocket_,messageHeaderTransform);
67  rTransform = transformSocket_->GetConnected();
68  }
69  transformSocket_->CloseSocket();
70 }
71 
72 void RosOpenIgtlBridge::openIGTLinkThread()
73 {
74  ROS_INFO("Entering Command Thread");
75  commandSocket_ = igtl::ClientSocket::New();
76  commandSocket_->DebugOff();
77  rCommand=-1;
78  double startTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
79  double endTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
80  ROS_INFO_STREAM("rCommand: " << rCommand);
81  do
82  {
83  rCommand = commandSocket_->ConnectToServer(COMMAND_IP,COMMAND_PORT);
84  endTime = ros::Time::now().toSec();
85  ROS_WARN_NAMED("ROSOpenIGTL","Trying to connect to OpenIGTL-Server");
86  }
87  while(rCommand==-1 && ros::ok() && endTime - startTime <= CONNECTION_TIMEOUT);
88  if(rCommand==-1)
89  {
90  ROS_ERROR("No OpenIGTLink-Server available");
91  ros::shutdown();
92  }
93 
94  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("rCommand: " << rCommand << " rTransform: " << rTransform);
95 
96  this->sendCommand(commandSocket_,"Idle;");
97  ros::Rate rate(1/sampleTime_);
98  while(rCommand!=-1 && ros::ok())
99  {
100  ros::spinOnce();
101  if(sendTransformFlag)
102  {
103  sendTransformFlag = false;
104  igtl::MessageHeader::Pointer messageHeaderCommand;
105  messageHeaderCommand = igtl::MessageHeader::New();
106  positionReached_ = this->positionReached(commandSocket_,messageHeaderCommand);
107  }
108  // Get pose of flange
109  this->transformUpdateMutex_.lock();
110  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped poseFLmsg;
111  poseFLmsg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
112  poseFLmsg.pose = poseFL;
113  this->flangePub.publish(poseFLmsg);
114  this->transformUpdateMutex_.unlock();
115  if(transformReceived_)
116  {
117  this->sendCommand(commandSocket_,openIGTLCommandString);
118  transformReceived_ = false;
119  }
120  rCommand = commandSocket_->GetConnected();
121  rate.sleep();
122  }
123  commandSocket_->CloseSocket();
124  stop_ = true;
125  ros::shutdown();
126 
127 }
128 
129 int RosOpenIgtlBridge::positionReached(igtl::ClientSocket::Pointer &socket, igtl::MessageBase::Pointer &msgHeader)
130 {
131  msgHeader->InitPack();
132  rCommand = socket->Receive(msgHeader->GetPackPointer(),msgHeader->GetPackSize());
133  msgHeader->Unpack();
134  igtl::StringMessage::Pointer stringMsg;
135  stringMsg->SetMessageHeader(msgHeader);
136  stringMsg->AllocatePack();
137  socket->Receive(stringMsg->GetPackBodyPointer(), stringMsg->GetPackBodySize());
138  stringMsg->Unpack();
139  std::string msg = stringMsg->GetString();
140  if(msg == "true")
141  {
142  return 1;
143  }
144  return 0;
145 }
146 
147 int RosOpenIgtlBridge::receiveTransform(igtl::ClientSocket::Pointer &socket, igtl::MessageBase::Pointer &msgHeader)
148 {
149  igtl::TransformMessage::Pointer transformMsg;
150  msgHeader->InitPack();
151  rTransform = socket->Receive(msgHeader->GetPackPointer(),msgHeader->GetPackSize());
152  msgHeader->Unpack();
153  transformMsg = igtl::TransformMessage::New();
154  transformMsg->SetMessageHeader(msgHeader);
155  transformMsg->AllocatePack();
156  socket->Receive(transformMsg->GetPackBodyPointer(), transformMsg->GetPackBodySize());
157  transformMsg->Unpack();
158  if(strcmp(transformMsg->GetDeviceName(),"T_EE")==0)
159  {
160  this->transformUpdateMutex_.lock();
161  transformMsg->GetMatrix(T_FL);
162  poseFL = this->igtlMatrixToRosPose(T_FL);
163  this->transformUpdateMutex_.unlock();
164  return 1;
165  }
166  return 0;
167 }
168 
169 
170 int RosOpenIgtlBridge::sendCommand(igtl::ClientSocket::Pointer &socket, std::string command)
171 {
172  igtl::StringMessage::Pointer transformStringMsg;
173  transformStringMsg = igtl::StringMessage::New();
174  std::stringstream transformStream;
175  CMD_UID++;
176  if(this->CMD_UID > 999999999999) this->CMD_UID =0;
177  transformStream << "CMD_" << CMD_UID;
178  // Set UID
179  transformStringMsg->SetDeviceName(transformStream.str().c_str());
180  transformStream.str(std::string());
181  transformStringMsg->SetString(command);
182  transformStringMsg->Pack();
183  return socket->Send(transformStringMsg->GetPackPointer(),transformStringMsg->GetPackSize());
184 }
185 
186 std::string RosOpenIgtlBridge::rosPoseToIGTL(geometry_msgs::Pose pose)
187 {
188  std::stringstream sstream;
189  pose.position.x*=MM_TO_M;
190  pose.position.y*=MM_TO_M;
191  pose.position.z*=MM_TO_M;
192  Eigen::Affine3d poseToEigen;
193  tf::poseMsgToEigen(pose,poseToEigen);
194 
195  sstream << poseToEigen.translation().x();
196  sstream << poseToEigen.translation().y();
197  sstream << poseToEigen.translation().z();
198  for(int row=0;row<3;row++)
199  {
200  for(int col=0; col<3; col++)
201  {
202  sstream << poseToEigen.matrix()(row,col);
203  }
204  }
205  return sstream.str();
206 
207 }
208 
209 geometry_msgs::Pose RosOpenIgtlBridge::igtlMatrixToRosPose(igtl::Matrix4x4& igtlMatrix)
210 {
211  geometry_msgs::Pose returnValue;
212  Eigen::Affine3d eigenMatrix;
213  for(int row=0;row<4;row++)
214  {
215  for(int col=0;col<4;col++)
216  {
217  eigenMatrix.matrix()(row,col) = igtlMatrix[row][col];
218  }
219  }
220  tf::poseEigenToMsg(eigenMatrix,returnValue);
221  returnValue.position.x *= M_TO_MM;
222  returnValue.position.y *= M_TO_MM;
223  returnValue.position.z *= M_TO_MM;
224  return returnValue;
225 }
226 
227 bool RosOpenIgtlBridge::stateService(masterslave::OpenIGTLStateService::Request &req, masterslave::OpenIGTLStateService::Response &res)
228 {
229  std::stringstream sstream;
230  if(rTransform==-1)
231  {
232  res.alive = false;
233  }
234  else
235  {
236  res.alive = true;
237  }
238  stateString = req.state;
239  sstream << stateString;
240  if(rosTransformReceived_ && stateString == "MoveToPose;rob;")
241  {
242  sstream << rosPoseToIGTL(poseFL_new);
243  rosTransformReceived_ = false;
244  }
245  else if(stateString == "MoveToJointAngles;")
246  {
247  for(int i=0;i<jointAngles_new.rows();i++)
248  {
249  sstream << jointAngles_new(i) << ";";
250  }
251  }
252  openIGTLCommandString = sstream.str();
253  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Commandstring: " << openIGTLCommandString);
254  sstream.str(std::string());
255  return true;
256 }
257 
258 void RosOpenIgtlBridge::lbrJointAngleCallback(const std_msgs::Float64ConstPtr &jointAngle, int number)
259 {
260  jointAngles_new(number) = jointAngle->data;
261 }
